post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
This is also another internal job posting in my company.
Please let me know if anybody is interested or let your friends who might be interested in this position. ............................................ Position: 1 Year Contract / TCC Business Solutions Agent
Location: 3 Concorde Gate, Toronto
Posting Date: November 7, 2003 Closing Date: November 21, 2003
Reporting to Manager, Business Solutions. This employee will be responsible for the administration duties in the department. This position is responsible for providing advice and guidance to branches across Canada on branch administration policies and procedures, daily operations/transactions ensuring that company policy is adhered to for SUPREME.
Knowledge, Skills, Experience
* Basic knowledge of accounting practices. * Working knowledge of spreadsheet and word-processing software as well as a
thorough knowledge of Microsoft Outlook. * Experience with SUPREME is an asset * Must be able to work effectively in a deadline driven environment. * Good verbal and written communication skills. * Must be well organized and patient.
Qualified candidates can send their resume to: HeidiStephenson@financial.wellsfargo.com or fax (416) 382-5509. Resumes must be received no later than November 21, 2003
post.title: 1 Year Contract / TCC Business Solutions Agent
